Who: RODIMUS PRIME, SCOURGE, SCORPONOK, CYCLONUS, DEEPSTRYKE, PHOBIA,
Kup, Tuscon, Nightshift, Darkhawk
Location: Black Fortress - Hallways

> Tucson looks to Rodimus.
>
> "Rodimus, Change of plan. Nightshift's right. I shouldn't try to do this alone. And I know you wish to redeem yourself faithfully. Well, this is where we begin. I trust you'll be able to handle this with ease."
>
> He alligns his missile launchers in anticipation of a shoot out.

Rodimus nodded as he checked his rifle, his photon eliminator, the
weapon was still full of power and ready to go, as was the rest of his
weaponry. He looked back up at Tuscon and nodded, "Ready!" he said
with a grim intensity.

> Kup attached himself the device and coneccted his traking devices to keep an
> eye in predacon signatures and looking to Nightlight and then to Rodimus, he
> said "I'll care her with my life..."
>
> The old Autobot waited to Rodimus response, perhaps he would like to tell
> something else before take her with him.

Rodimus looked at Kup, "Take her, protect her. I have trusted you with
my life in the past, and now I trust you with hers." Rodimus'
attention was ripped away from Kup by Darkhawk . . .

> "YOU WONT GO TO ANY WHERE!!!!"Said Darkhwak aiming his gun

"Yes they will!" Rodimus said as he stepped slightly from his postion,
hopefully drawing attention away from Kup and Nightlight to him.
Flicking his weapon to full stunning power he fired at Darkhawk,
trying to stun him and take him out of action.

Even as Rodimus acted, Cyclonus, Deepstryke, and Phobia stepped around
the corner weapons already drawn, backing up Scourge, Scorponok and
Darkhawk. Thier presence making the count atleast six Predacon,
Decepticons and Minions against four beleagered Maximals and Autobots
- well only three if Kup actually leaves!

"No." Cyclonus intoned dangerously, his voice deep and commanding, "they won't."

Without a thought Rodimus clicked his weapon over to combat mode and
sent beams of searing electricity at Cyclonus and the others with him,
forcing them to step back. "GO!" Rodimus barked at Kup, "We will
follow when we can!" He said without thinking.

Cyclonus and the others forces of Hydras began returning fire lighting
up the hallway!

Rodimus spoke to Tuscon without turning away from the firefight, "We
may want fall back, Hydras himself will be here soon!" It was not fear
in Rodimus voice, only the grim reality of battle and the stating of
options. It was clear by Rodimus' actions that he was ready to lay
down his life in protection of the others.

(TAG)


Meanwhile . . .

Who: LEGACY, Quickstride, Rat Trap
Location: Outside the Black fortress

In the distance, should either Rat Trap or Quickstride be looking in
the proper direction the large form of Legacy could be made out in the
distance. A small but growing black spec appearing on the horizon. He
was still in his military satalite mode, and that was becoming more
and more evident as time passed as his shape slowly became more clear.

"Maximals and Autobots" Legacy's familiar yet cold voice reached
through the encrypted Autobot channels hopefully to catch Tuscon's
attention, but at the very least Rat Trap and Quickstride, "What is
your status? I shall be arriving in 187.55 astro seconds."

(TAG)

OOC: Airly, if you want Talon and the shuttle to accompany that is
fine. It is up to Kraftlos if he want's his characters aboard as well.

Preston
